name: SaaS Onboarding Warmup
description: Guided SaaS onboarding arc that introduces the product value, shows the live product, and ends with a pricing nudge.

screens.name: Hero Welcome
screens.description: Friendly onboarding hero with illustration-driven storytelling and CTA pair.

intentHints.contentFocus: Capture the brand promise and invite users to get started

heroDefaults.vibe: Playful hero illustration of teammates collaborating in a bright studio
heroDefaults.imagePrompt: Vibrant vector illustration of people onboarding to a product with floating UI panels

screens.name: Product Tour
screens.description: Dashboard overview that highlights key modules and metrics.

intentHints.contentFocus: Showcase live product UI with labeled benefits

heroDefaults.vibe: 3D render of floating dashboards and charts
heroDefaults.imagePrompt: 3D layered dashboard panels with depth-of-field lighting

screens.name: Pricing + CTA
screens.description: Pricing comparison with CTA to convert trial users.

intentHints.contentFocus: Present two or three pricing tiers with primary CTA

heroDefaults.vibe: Calm gradient-backed abstract city skyline representing scalability
heroDefaults.imagePrompt: Soft gradient abstract skyline with geometric shapes symbolizing product tiers
